testsuite.name: Test @focus and @pending on Schematron-specific x:expect-* elements together

testcase.name: Schematron-specific x:expect-* elements in a non-pending scenario alongside a focused scenario must be Pending assert
Schematron-specific x:expect-* elements in a non-pending scenario alongside a focused scenario must be Pending report
Schematron-specific x:expect-* elements in a non-pending scenario alongside a focused scenario must be Pending not assert
Schematron-specific x:expect-* elements in a non-pending scenario alongside a focused scenario must be Pending not report
Schematron-specific x:expect-* elements in a non-pending scenario alongside a focused scenario must be Pending rule
Schematron-specific x:expect-* elements in a non-pending scenario alongside a focused scenario must be Pending valid
Schematron-specific x:expect-* elements in a focused scenario alongside another focused scenario must execute the test assert
Schematron-specific x:expect-* elements in a focused scenario alongside another focused scenario must execute the test report
Schematron-specific x:expect-* elements in a focused scenario alongside another focused scenario must execute the test not assert
Schematron-specific x:expect-* elements in a focused scenario alongside another focused scenario must execute the test not report
Schematron-specific x:expect-* elements in a focused scenario alongside another focused scenario must execute the test rule
Schematron-specific x:expect-* elements in a focused scenario alongside another focused scenario must execute the test valid
Schematron-specific x:expect-* elements with @pending must be Pending assert
Schematron-specific x:expect-* elements with @pending must be Pending report
Schematron-specific x:expect-* elements with @pending must be Pending not assert
Schematron-specific x:expect-* elements with @pending must be Pending not report
Schematron-specific x:expect-* elements with @pending must be Pending rule
Schematron-specific x:expect-* elements with @pending must be Pending valid
Schematron-specific x:expect-* elements with both @pending and ancestor::x:scenario/@focus must execute the test (not recommended as ambiguous) assert
Schematron-specific x:expect-* elements with both @pending and ancestor::x:scenario/@focus must execute the test (not recommended as ambiguous) report
Schematron-specific x:expect-* elements with both @pending and ancestor::x:scenario/@focus must execute the test (not recommended as ambiguous) not assert
Schematron-specific x:expect-* elements with both @pending and ancestor::x:scenario/@focus must execute the test (not recommended as ambiguous) not report
Schematron-specific x:expect-* elements with both @pending and ancestor::x:scenario/@focus must execute the test (not recommended as ambiguous) rule
Schematron-specific x:expect-* elements with both @pending and ancestor::x:scenario/@focus must execute the test (not recommended as ambiguous) valid
